item.title: A sendMessage problem? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Alright, so I added something for farming in my server and what happens is I click the object and it doesn’t do a basic sendMessage.

This is in the firstClickObject method of ActionHandler.

if(objectType == 8151) { System.out.println("Test"); Farming.inspectPatch(c); }

This is the inspectPatch method

public static void inspectPatch(Client c) { System.out.println("Debug"); c.sendMessage("There are "+getSeedName(c.farmingSeed)+" seeds planted here."); }

All that comes out of the console is

[7/14/14 8:48 PM]: objectId: 8151 ObjectX: 2813 objectY: 3463 Xoff: 2 Yoff: 1

I have no idea what’s causing this not to send the message, I’ve been trying for about ten minutes and can’t get it to send properly.

Read full topic
